mapper.select: /* dashboard.selectProjectInfo */ SELECT CP.PROJECT_ID, CP.USE_CH_GRP_INFO, CONCAT(CU.USER_NAME, '(', CU.LOGIN_ID ,')') AS USER_INFO, DATE_FORMAT(CP.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM cm_console.CM_PROJECT CP INNER JOIN cm_console.CM_USER CU ON CP.REG_ID = CU.USER_ID WHERE CP.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
